data.description: Principles of selection, production, handling, use of fruits, vegetables, flowers, and foliage plants grown indoors. One-day field trip required.
data.title: GREENHOUSE CULTIVATION

data.description: Provide students with hands-on experience in and understanding of greenhouse cultivation. The optional lab component ofHORT 334Greenhouse Cultivation.
data.title: GREENHOUSE CULTIVATION LAB

data.description: For the beginning student. Scientific basis for horticultural practices; scope of the field of horticulture; introduction to propagation, culture, management, improvement, storage, and marketing of flowers, fruits, ornamentals and vegetables.
data.title: SURVEY OF HORTICULTURE
